style: The game should use a descriptive and immersive writing style, with a futuristic sci-fi theme set on the moon. The atmosphere should feel mysterious and engaging, with common terminology that includes space and lunar exploration concepts.

landing_zone.overview: The place where the lunar module landed.

lunar_habitat.overview: A temporary habitat for astronauts to live and conduct research.

lunar_rover.overview: A vehicle used to transport astronauts across the lunar surface.

mysterious_crater.overview: An unusual crater that seems to emit a strange light.

astro_1.name: Astronaut Julia
astro_1.overview: Julia is an experienced astronaut and an engineer.

astro_2.name: Astronaut Alex
astro_2.overview: Alex is a rookie astronaut who specializes in geology.

item1.name: Lunar rock
item1.overview: A rock with an unusual glowing property.

item2.name: Moon Buggy
item2.overview: A small vehicle to drive to and from lunar locations.

quest1.name: Investigate the Mysterious Crater
quest1.overview: Astronaut Alex needs your help to study the strange light emitting from the crater.

quest2.name: Repair the Moon Buggy
quest2.overview: Astronaut Julia needs assistance in fixing the moon buggy to reach more distant locations on the moon.
